title: Sidewall, "Artisan Embroidered", 2010
medium: Woven and embroidered with polyethylene yarn
provenance: Given new to Cooper-Hewitt by the manufacturer in 2013.
description: Design contains delicately embroidered circular shapes appearing somewhat randomly placed with some overlapping on a white woven ground. Each of the motifs is embroidered in one of three colors: gray, black or tan with the tan being the largest, the gray medium and the black the smallest in size. The woven backing and embroidery have a slight sheen.

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall, "Artisan Embroidered", 2010. Woven and embroidered with polyethylene yarn. Gift of Carnegie Fabrics. 2013-44-1.
